text: Soshite kare-ra wa (sonotame ni) kokoromi (no chobatsu) ga nai mono to kangaete ita. Sore de kare-ra wa momoku ya nancho-sha to nattaga, sonogo arra wa, kare-ra no kaigo o yurushi nasareta. Soredemo kare-ra no oku wa matamo, mizukara momoku ya nancho-sha to natta. Arra wa kare-ra no okonau tokoro o, gozonji de ara reru
